articles.title: Kaagaz movie review: Pankaj Tripathi shines in distressingly dated film - The Indian Express
articles.description: Kaagaz movie review: The plot is littered with clichés, and comes off distressingly dated: the evil aunt rolls her eyes, the bad guys swirl their ‘moochch’, the item girl swings her waist, the sarkari cogs-in-the-wheel smirk, and so on.
